articles.title: ICC World Cup 2023 Most Wicket Takers List: These Indian bowlers have made it to Top 10 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The ICC World Cup 2023 is turning out to witness stunning bowling performances from a number of teams like New Zealand, India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan and . South Africa.
articles.content: In the ICC World Cup 2023, the bowlers have been making significant impacts, with Mitchell Santner from New Zealand leading the pack. Santner has taken 12 wickets in 47 overs, giving away just 203 ru… [+1969 chars]
